exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros l n Hin. unfold newVar. induction l. - simpl. intros H. contradiction. - unfold newVar in IHl. simpl. intros [H | H]. + subst. apply Nat.lt_succ_diag_r. + apply Nat.lt_trans with (m := S (fold_right Nat.max 0 (map S l))). * apply IHl. apply H. * apply Nat.lt_succ_r.
